input.sentences: here are some of the many books here .
here is an older child drawing a very nice picture
here is a bunch of kids drawing .
output.sentences: All the children were happy to be going to the giant book fair.
The kids not only enjoyed reading their books but also drawing.
The kids were very happy to learn that they had so many books to choose from.
One of the children was drawing a very nice picture.
After awhile a bunch of other kids join in to draw their own pictures.
